Stock nanoplatelets have dimensions 33.654 nm by 6.926 nm and the optical density of 100x hexanes dilution of stock is 0.150% recorded at 512 nm. 0.250 mL nanoplatelets stock is diluted 7x by hexanes using 1.750 mL for each trial of doping. Silver acetate solution of 0.00600 M is made with 3.500 mg of silver acetate in 2.496 mL of MeOH and 0.999 mL of water. 2.000 % Ag doping requires 2.010 uL of silver doping solution, respectively. The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.04000000000000001;0.01897366596101028

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.186;0.06770524351924304

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.2;0.09818350166906861

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.226;0.018547236990991405

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.28800000000000003;0.044

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.355;0.08683317338436963

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.376;0.3147443406957463

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 60.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.42400000000000004;0.13807244475274563

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.456;0.29486267990371384

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.6000000000000001;0.29332575747792766

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 0.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;0.924;0.3901589419710895

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;1.492;0.6530972362519994

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 25.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;130.222;259.8890258860501

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 180.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;130.494;259.75338185286444

The reaction was performed at 1000 rpm for 10.0 minutes at 50.000 oC. Fluorescence of each doped sample was collected as a 30x dilution with hexanes.;260.222;318.2524073373209

Stock nanoplatelets have dimensions 30.594 nm by 8.897 nm and the optical density of 100x hexanes dilution of stock is 0.300% recorded at 512 nm. 0.500 mL nanoplatelets stock is diluted 7x by hexanes using 3.500 mL for each trial of doping.
